name: shortLeg
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has shorter legs. It can not work as hard as others, but it is kind of cute so will make me happier

name: moreHuman
text: A spaceship flied pass and I caught it
option1ResultText: You get some more human. But they don't like the life here and somehow make all human less efficient. Weird.
option2ResultText: Haha, their faces are funny when I put them in my mouth.

name: shortLegDiscrimination
text: The short leg human are discrimated by other human. They think the short ones are not "nature"
option1ResultText: The ones with the shorter legs are not good at fighting. Some get killed during the battle.
option2Text: Kill the leader of the "nature" human
column11: The battle stopped immediately. Another peaceful day on the planet.

name: tentacleArm
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has tentacle arm. It does not work as good as arms it used to have, but hey these tentacles make it looks more like my specy
option2ResultText: Like me or not, if it can not work I don't want it.

name: pincerArm
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It has a pincer arm… Might be a good help as a cook but I think the shape is quite dangerous to my tentacles…

name: breathWithoutHelmet
text: The human mutate while breeding and a new type of human is born. It can breath without helmet.

name: pincerAndTentacleBattle
text: the human with pincer and human with tentacle has a battle.

name: tentacleWorship
text: human start to worship the ones with tentacle

name: pincerWorship
text: human start to worship the ones with pincer

name: trade
text: A spaceship passed and the one on the ship is interested to your human
